dwelling.name: Goblin Barracks
dwelling.description: Gives goblins to a visiting hero for free once per week

dwelling.name: Wolf pen
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit wolf riders. Replenishes every week

dwelling.name: Orc Tower
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit orcs. Replenishes every week

dwelling.name: Ogre Fort
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit ogres. Replenishes every week

dwelling.name: Cliff Nest
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit rocs. Replenishes every week. Guarded by several rocs

dwelling.name: Cyclops Cave
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit cyclopes. Replenishes every week. Guarded by several cyclopes

dwelling.name: Behemoth Lair
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit behemoths. Replenishes every week. Guarded by a few behemoths
